mainTemple.title: Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple
mainTemple.description: One of the largest temples in India, dedicated to Lord Shiva
mainTemple.history: Built in the 9th century, this temple complex spans 25 acres
mainTemple.timings: Open from 5:30 AM to 12:30 PM and 4:00 PM to 9:00 PM

girivalam.description: Girivalam is the practice of circumambulating Arunachala, believed to dissolve karma and bestow liberation
girivalam.bestTime: Best time to perform: Full moon nights (Pournami)

linghams.title: Ashta Lingams of Arunachala
linghams.subtitle: Eight sacred lingams placed around Arunachala, each facing one of the cardinal directions, represent the Ashta Dikpalakas (Guardians of Directions). Pilgrims receive unique blessings from each as they perform Giri Pradakshina.

cta.title: Begin Your Sacred Journey
cta.description: Whether you're planning a physical pilgrimage or spiritual contemplation, the Ashta Lingams offer a unique path to connect with Shiva in all His aspects. Visit, meditate, and feel the presence of Arunachala.

indra.name: Indra Lingam
indra.description: Indra, king of heaven, grants spiritual insight and rides the four-tusked elephant Iravathi. This lingam is close to the eastern tower of the Big Temple on Car Street.

agni.name: Agni Lingam
agni.description: Agni, the god of fire and knowledge, acts as the divine messenger. Worshipped during homas, Agni connects man and gods. Found near Seshadri Ashram.

about.description: BKND Groups is dedicated to promoting the spiritual, cultural, and natural beauty of Tiruvannamalai. We help travelers explore this sacred land through reliable information, curated guides, and community-powered insights.

bottom.welcomeText: Whether you are a spiritual seeker, casual traveler, or cultural enthusiast, Tiruvannamalai welcomes you.
